messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello Crew I hope this round will be a peacefull round but we all know there are traitors Please Report anything you find i suspect we may have xenos on board but im not 100%

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Did you guys have a wizard teleport onto the station with a bomb, not asking for any particular reason of course.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Your station goal is to build the bluespace artillery, if we send the parts are you willing to build it?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: I just found a storage implants in maintanence, we have confirmed traitors

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Engineers security has a ton of damage aswell as cargo and now you have an electrical storm so goodluck and whoever this traitor is is very destructive

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: I just thought the whole time that r-comms is knocked out till i ralized that the singularity fucked my headset.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Chap's a traitor you are free to kill him, watch out he has an laser gun and an E-Bow

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.
